name: Urja Sood
title: Computer Science Specialist @ University of Toronto
subtitle: Seeking Co-op Internship Roles (2026)
bio: I am Urja Sood, a third-year Computer Science Specialist at the University of Toronto with a minor in Business, Science, and Entrepreneurship. My journey so far has been about exploring both sides of the equation: the elegance of code and the strategy that turns technology into real-world solutions. I have built skills across Python, Java, C, Go, and RISC-V Assembly, while also diving into systems programming, AI/ML, and cloud technologies like Azure. I thrive on tackling technical challenges that demand both precision and creativity. I enjoy thinking not just about how to build, but also why the things I create should make processes smarter, businesses more efficient, and people's lives easier. I am always looking for opportunities where I can grow, collaborate with curious and ambitious people, and contribute to building something impactful. If you are working on projects that sit at the crossroads of technology, strategy, and innovation, I would love to connect.
summary: Driven Computer Science student at the University of Toronto minoring in Business, Science, and Entrepreneurship. Passionate about software development, system design, and leveraging technology to create user-focused, innovative solutions. Skilled in problem-solving, efficient system design, and aligning technical work with business goals. Dean's List scholar committed to contributing to high-impact, collaborative projects.
